system.description:
This spell is the most powerful version of the Create Monsters series, allowing the caster to summon nearly any creature.

Spell Details:

  • Summoned creatures appear out of thin air and obey the caster’s commands.
  • The maximum total Hit Dice of all creatures created is equal to the caster’s level (drop fractions).
  • Creatures disappear when the duration ends, unless a construct is created.

Creature Restrictions:

  • The spell cannot create humans or demihumans.
  • Unlike lesser versions, this spell can summon creatures with any number of special abilities (asterisks).
  • To create a creature with three or more asterisks, the caster must have studied such a creature (alive or dead) for at least one hour.

Construct Creation:

  • The spell can create a permanent construct, provided the necessary materials are used.
  • Only one construct can be created per casting, regardless of the caster’s level.
  • The construct remains permanent but can be destroyed by Dispel Magic (normal chances for success).
  • The cost of materials is 5,000 gp per asterisk, or double for constructs with four or more asterisks (e.g., a drolem).
  • Chapter 16 contains more rules for enchanting nondispellable constructs.

Countermeasures:

  • Summoned creatures cannot penetrate a Protection from Evil or Anti-Magic Shell.
